intro: Breitungia, commonly known as the star-of-Bavaria, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Acanthaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, particularly South Africa. The plants are characterized by their showy, often brightly colored flowers that resemble stars, hence their common name. Breitungia species typically have opposite, ovate leaves and produce small, clustered inflorescences. They are often cultivated for their ornamental value in gardens and greenhouses.
